EXTRAORDINARY 
PUBLISHED BY AUTHORITY 
ISLAMABAD, WEDNESDAY, NOVEMBER 11, 2015 
PART II 
Statutory Notifications (S. R. 0.) 
GOVERNMENT OF PAKISTAN 
REVENUE DIVISION 
(Federal Board of Revenue) 
NOTIFICATION 
Islamabad, the 27th October, 2015 
(Cumin/is) 
S. R. 0. 1109 (1)12015.—In exercise of the powers conferred by section 219 of the 
Customs Act, 1969 (IV of 1969), the Federal Board of Revenue is pleased to direct that the 
following further amendments shall be made in the Customs Rules, 2001, namely:— 
In the aforesaid Rules,— 
(a) 	in rule 93, in sub-rule (1), after the figure "5000", the words "for examination- 
related expenses" shall be inserted; and 
in rule 99, in sub-rule (1), after the word "course", occurring for the second 
time, the words "for training-related expenses" shall be inserted. 
[C. No. 1 (7)/L&P/20061 	
MUHAMMAD ARSHAD KHAN, 
Secretary (Law and Procedure). 
(3721) 
PRINTED BY THE MANAGER, PRINTING CORPORATION OF PAKISTAN PRESS, ISLAMABAD 
PUBLISHED BY THE DEPUTY CONTROLLER, STATIONERY AND FORMS, UNIVERSITY ROAD; KARACHI 
[1956 (2015)/Ex. Gaz.] 	 Price: Rs. 2.00 (h)
